paper_abstract: This paper presents a measure-theoretical approach for finding approximate solution of complex optimal control problems. The general continuous optimal control problem for a class of hybrid dynamical systems is considered, and it is detailed that how to replace the problem by one in measure space and solve the equivalent finite-dimensional linear problem in a straightforward manner. Computational experiments show that the proposed algorithm could substantially reduce the solving time, compared with the other techniques.
paper_title: A NUMERICAL SCHEME FOR APPROXIMATE OPTIMAL CONTROL OF NONLINEAR HYBRID SYSTEMS
